participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, values companionship and personal growth.
participant_1.background: My dogs are my best friends and I want to learn how to be a better dog owner. I'm almost finished with my degree. I don't mind the rain, because it helps me drown out my terrible singing voice. I am a writer, and I use my solitude to my creative advantage. I just got back from a walk with my dog, and I'm looking forward to teaching her some new tricks!

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and artistic, enjoys capturing life's moments and cherishing family time.
participant_2.background: My home is in Pittsburgh, where I am able to find inspiration and capture the beauty of the city through my camera. I grew up in Alabama. My favorite jello is the blue one. I'm a single dad, but I'm doing my best to raise my daughter right. I saw a solar eclipse when I was 8 years old.

content.text: Hey there! How are you today?
Pretty good! Just got back from a walk. How about you?
I just finished a walk with my dog!
Nice! What kind of dog do you have?
A shih tzu! She's a handful, but I love her to death.
I love shih tzus! They're so cute. I have a dachshund.
Oh, I love dachshunds too! My dad had one when I was growing up.
They're the best dogs. Loyal and loving.
How long have you had your dachshund?
I've had her for about 5 years now. She's my best friend.
That's awesome! I'm glad you have such a great dog.
Thanks! What are you up to today?
I'm just working on my writing. I'm almost finished with my degree, so I'm trying to get as much done as I can.
That's awesome! What are you going to do after you graduate?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to grad school, but I'm not sure what I want to do.
Well, whatever you decide to do, I'm sure you'll be great at it
